Sentencas: Fast response, strong reliability, and high efficiency as the critical objectives of a solid oxide electrolysis cell (SOEC) system, which requires the system to operate under optimal operating conditions and switching manners.
Titulo: Control-oriented dynamic process optimization of solid oxide electrolysis cell system with the gas characteristic regarding oxygen electrode delamination

Sentencas: Therefore, various research has been carried out on its characteristic security.
Titulo: Control-oriented dynamic process optimization of solid oxide electrolysis cell system with the gas characteristic regarding oxygen electrode delamination

Sentencas: Most of them focus on the thermal characteristics security without further considering the security of gas characteristics regarding oxygen electrode delamination.
Titulo: Control-oriented dynamic process optimization of solid oxide electrolysis cell system with the gas characteristic regarding oxygen electrode delamination

Sentencas: However, this is one of the most critical degradations of SOEC.
Titulo: Control-oriented dynamic process optimization of solid oxide electrolysis cell system with the gas characteristic regarding oxygen electrode delamination

Sentencas: Herein, a novel SOEC system dynamic model with the gas characteristic regarding oxygen electrode delamination is proposed for the first time to optimize operation.
Titulo: Control-oriented dynamic process optimization of solid oxide electrolysis cell system with the gas characteristic regarding oxygen electrode delamination

Sentencas: Specially, the advantages are discussed through the optimization analysis of both the secure operation range regarding certain operating conditions and the steady-state operating points of the sys-tem.
Titulo: Control-oriented dynamic process optimization of solid oxide electrolysis cell system with the gas characteristic regarding oxygen electrode delamination

Sentencas: Subsequently, the dynamic process constraints of oxygen electrode delamination, fuel starvation, and power fast tracking during dynamic switching are investigated.
Titulo: Control-oriented dynamic process optimization of solid oxide electrolysis cell system with the gas characteristic regarding oxygen electrode delamination

Sentencas: The feasibilities of multi-step, parabola, and ramp schemes in solving the problems above are also evaluated.
Titulo: Control-oriented dynamic process optimization of solid oxide electrolysis cell system with the gas characteristic regarding oxygen electrode delamination

Sentencas: The outcomes show that the ramp scheme is preferred.
Titulo: Control-oriented dynamic process optimization of solid oxide electrolysis cell system with the gas characteristic regarding oxygen electrode delamination

Sentencas: Furthermore, the priority issue between oxygen electrode delamination and fuel starvation is studied, and cor-responding dynamic process optimization strategies are developed for high and low initial power with a two-step switching method.
Titulo: Control-oriented dynamic process optimization of solid oxide electrolysis cell system with the gas characteristic regarding oxygen electrode delamination

Sentencas: After that, the dynamic process optimizations of two representative cases are investigated in detail.
Titulo: Control-oriented dynamic process optimization of solid oxide electrolysis cell system with the gas characteristic regarding oxygen electrode delamination

Sentencas: The optimization results show that the system efficiency is increased, and the safe ramp duration under the low initial power is significantly shortened.
Titulo: Control-oriented dynamic process optimization of solid oxide electrolysis cell system with the gas characteristic regarding oxygen electrode delamination

Sentencas: The findings of this study could provide a basis for developing control strategies for SOEC systems with fluctuating energy input.
Titulo: Control-oriented dynamic process optimization of solid oxide electrolysis cell system with the gas characteristic regarding oxygen electrode delamination
